record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate will proceed to a period of morning business for up to 1 hour, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.
The Senator from Oklahoma is recognized.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to be recognized in morning business for whatever time I shall consume.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
